video_caption: The video begins with a person wearing a white lab coat and a dark shirt, seated in a well-lit room with a blue couch, bookshelves, and a potted plant in the background. The individual appears to be speaking, as indicated by their hand gestures and facial expressions. The scene then transitions to a stunning view of a nebula in space, showcasing vibrant pink and purple hues with stars scattered throughout. Following this, the video shifts to an aerial view of a large radio telescope situated in a remote, arid landscape, surrounded by sparse vegetation and a clear sky. The final scene captures a night sky filled with stars, viewed from the perspective of someone standing near a building, with a streetlamp visible in the foreground. The video effectively combines elements of scientific discussion, astronomical imagery, and the serene beauty of the night sky.

The video concludes with the laser beam continuing to bend around the wire, emphasizing the phenomenon of light diffraction.
